Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class ScoreManager

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.ScoreManager
public class ScoreManager extends Object
Manages the scoring system for both story and endless modes. Tracks player performance through a time-decay base score and bonus/penalty system.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ScoreManager getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of the ScoreManager. Creates a new instance if one doesn't exist yet.
      Returns:
      the global ScoreManager instance

    • update

      public void update(float delta)
      Updates the base score decay every frame. Called in GameScreen's update loop while the level is active.
      Parameters:
      delta - time elapsed since last frame in seconds (~0.016s at 60 FPS)

    • addBonus

      public void addBonus(String label, int points)
      Adds bonus points for positive player actions. Used for achievements like collecting keys, killing enemies, finding secrets, etc.
      Parameters:
      label - descriptive name for the bonus (shown on victory screen)
      points - number of points to award (usually 100-1000)

    • subtractPenalty

      public void subtractPenalty(String label, int points)
      Subtracts penalty points for negative events. Used for mistakes like taking damage or dying.
      Parameters:
      label - descriptive name for the penalty (shown on victory screen)
      points - number of points to subtract (positive value, gets subtracted)

    • finishLevel

      public void finishLevel(int remainingLives, float levelTimer)
      Finalizes the level score and adds completion bonuses. Called when the player successfully completes a level (reaches the exit).
      Parameters:
      remainingLives - player's health at level completion (for health bonus)
      levelTimer - time taken to complete the level in seconds (for speedrun check)

    • startNewLevel

      public void startNewLevel()
      Resets score state for the start of a new level. Called when transitioning to the next level in story mode or endless mode.

      Called by: - Story mode: When advancing to next story level - Endless mode: When generating next procedural level

    • resetTotalScore

      public void resetTotalScore()
      Resets the total game score for a new endless mode session. Called when starting a fresh endless mode run.

      This is different from startNewLevel() because it resets the cumulative score. Used when: - Starting a new endless mode session from the menu - Player wants to start a fresh endless run after game over

      Story mode does NOT call this - story scores accumulate across the entire campaign.

    • finalizeLoss

      public void finalizeLoss()
      Finalizes the score when the player dies (game over). Adds whatever score was earned in the current level to the total game score.

      Called by GameScreen when player health reaches 0.

    • getLevelTotal

      public int getLevelTotal()
      Calculates the total score for the current level. Combines the time-decayed base score with all accumulated bonuses and penalties.

      Formula: Level Total = Current Base Score + Session Bonus

      Returns:
      total points earned in the current level

    • getTotalGameScore

      public int getTotalGameScore()
      Gets the cumulative score across all completed levels. This is the final score displayed at game over or story completion.

      Story Mode: Sum of all level scores through the campaign Endless Mode: Sum of all level scores in the current endless session

      Returns:
      total game score across all levels

    • getBreakdown

      public Map<String,Integer> getBreakdown()
      Gets the detailed score breakdown for display on the victory screen. Returns a map of label â†’ points for all score components.
      Returns:
      map of score component labels to point values

    • getCurrentBase

      public int getCurrentBase()
      Gets the current base score (time performance). This is the 5000 starting score after time decay has been applied. Used for displaying live score during gameplay.
      Returns:
      current base score (500-5000 range)

    • loadScoreState

      public void loadScoreState(int totalScore, float currentLevelBaseScore, int sessionBonus)
      Loads saved score state from a save file. Used by GameStateManager when loading story mode progress. Called when loading a story mode save file.
      Parameters:
      totalScore - cumulative score to restore
      currentLevelBaseScore - base score of current level to restore
      sessionBonus - accumulated bonuses/penalties to restore

    • getLevelBaseScore

      public float getLevelBaseScore()
      Gets the current level's base score as a float (preserves decimal precision). Used by save system to preserve exact decay state.
      Returns:
      current base score with decimal precision

    • getSessionBonus

      public int getSessionBonus()
      Gets the current session's accumulated bonuses and penalties. This is the sum of all addBonus() and subtractPenalty() calls. Used by save system and for live score display.
      Returns:
      accumulated bonus/penalty points (can be negative)
